projects.title: Personal Tracker
projects.description: Design was Texas MSP430F5xx family microcontroller based project. GSM modem, GPS are the main parts of the project which aim to track the carrier and send location info in desired intervals to server. It also offers couple of buttons which are programmable for desired feedback. Both bootloader and application software are implemented in embedded C and assembly languages.

projects.title: Pyrolytic Oven Control Unit
projects.description: Follow up pyrolytic oven control unit project and directing project flow between test and design facilities in accordance with project targets. Pyrolytic oven has self cleaning ability in order to ease end user issues. When this functionality is activated oven heats up to 500 C which is over regular cooking temperature and during this period device locks its door in accordance with safety reasons.

profile_positions.description:
Sr. Project Manager
Working for high tech projects in ASML.
Responsible from deliveries, resourcing and finance of the projects.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project Manager / Engagement Manager

profile_positions.description:
* Lead AndroidTV and FireTV project teams. Coordinate with multiple teams to drive Software Technical Approval for new generation AndroidTV / FireTV projects.
* 3 Millions Android TV units deployed to the field.
* ref+ & ref AndroidTV and AOSP-based Visual Display projects
* Big Data project covering Linux TV and Android TV sets deployed to 15 million TV units in the field.
* Responsible for device security of Linux OS-based Smart TV sets.
profile_positions.title: Head of AndroidTV / FireTV / TV Security / BigData-on-Device Development Group

profile_positions.description:
* Manage teams (3-20 engineers) that develop next-generation projects
* Coache and grow the development team and support their decisions
* Empower the team to own their work and support continuous improvement
* Interact with stakeholders; Product Management,  Hardware, Development, and Verification teams
* Support production and deployment stages of Linux-based Smart TV/Set-Top-Box/TV-Box products 
* Deployment of the most sophisticated PVR product in the company.
* Prepare project plans. Submit weekly and monthly management reports. 
* Track and maintain project progress via various tools (JIRA, Confluence, Excel, project plans, etc.)
* Act as the point of contact and communicate project status adequately to all stakeholders
* 40 K units deployed to the field.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Technical Software Project Manager - Linux Set-Top-Box Projects for retail products

profile_positions.description:
* Set-Top-Box projects for Europe operator business 
* Manage Linux OS-based DVB Set Top Box Software projects.
* Conax and Nagra CAS based Set-Top-Boxes
* Use agile methodologies to empower team
* Facilitate scrum events within a team working on software development
* 100K units deployed to the field.
profile_positions.title: Technical Software Project Manager - Linux Set-Top-Box Projects for Operator Business

profile_positions.description:
Embedded software development of- Linux OS-based LCD TV sets in Embedded C and C++. Participated in code review for definite modules like satellite reception part and channel list within the DVB stack middleware. Overall code was about 2 million lines of code with up to 20 engineers geographically distributed. Therefore CI/CD was one the very crucial facilitator to ensure that developers deliver the top quality code and keep the code repository up and running at all times. 

SVN, Jira, and confluence were actively used as daily life tools. Besides, static analysis tools like Klocwork and dynamic analysis tools like Valgrind were used for better code quality.
profile_positions.title: Software Architect - Linux TV for retail market

profile_positions.description:
Embedded software development of Linux OS-based LCD TV sets. 

C++ and embedded C were used to develop the software stack. Cross-functional development role was played from drivers to application level by owning relevant functionalities like satellite reception and operator installation capabilities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer - Linux TV for the EU and the UK retail market

profile_positions.description:
Information Communication Technologies (ICT), Marine Electronics, Mobile Solutions.
* Bootloader development of the TI MSP SoC
* Development of the personal tracker device which is an embedded system.

I worked as a software developer responsible for developing both bootloader and system software for personal tracking devices based on TI MSP SoC with a built-in SIM card and GPS module. C and assembly languages were used for the bootloader module while C++ was used for application development. Experienced in GPS, GPRS, and data smart card technologies to achieve the overarching goal.
profile_positions.title: System Software Development Expert

profile_positions.description: Embedded software development of Flat Panel TV Systems including driver, middleware and application layers.
profile_positions.title: Senior Embedded Software Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Embedded system development of CRT and TFT LCD TV systems including drivers of peripheral modules like video, and audio decoders. 

C development language was majorly used. As one of the 8-engineer team, I used CVS as a code repository for continuous development.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Development of new concepts and applications for electronic control equipment of cooking appliances by new technologies. Leading and organization of new electronics projects.

Development of new concept projects including hardware and software for cooking devices like electrical hobs, induction hobs, and smart ovens. Java and C languages were used to develop software modules.
profile_positions.title: Concept Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Design and development of both hardware design and software design of embedded industrial control systems like operator panels with LCDs, the embedded control units of electrical cooking sets, and electronic thermostat devices for freezers. 

Embedded C language was used to develop software modules majorly on NEC industrial microcontrollers.
profile_positions.title: System Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Founded a startup company to do modernization of legacy textile machines both developing hardware and mechanical equipment and software design and development. 

Later on, lead the digital transformation of mechanical systems to electronic systems by developing CAD / CAM software modules. 

Borland Delphi was used to develop software modules. A fabric simulation module was also developed to lower the cost of industry requirements.
profile_positions.title: Managing Shareholder

profile_positions.description: Participated in different departments of giant automative factory (such as electronic maintenance, pressing, painting, assemblying, which are technical parts of the production chain), majorly at electronics maintanence department,
profile_positions.title: Intern
